content:
You don't lose the ability to think about the future, you realize that you never could in the first place. 

If you imagine thought to be like a hologram generator, the realization is contingent upon seeing that the hologram generator exists in the present and creates an image in the present. When you say "I'm going to plan my day tomorrow" you ask the hologram to simulate an image. When you remember the past, you ask the the hologram to simulate an image. All of these images exist in the present and are the current configuration of the hologram, they have nothing to do with the past or future. 

The realization is essentially seeing "oh, I can't think about the past or the future, I can only *think* which occurs in the present".
